content.description: Don't be deceived! This route is very much the grade and deceptively hard. Start on the far right side of the boulder and traverse the slopers going left.
content.protection: 2-3 pads. With an active spotter, just 1 to move around as you move
content.location: Uphill from The Wave, this boulder is on the left and in the alcove, look for the obvious sloper rail system about chest-head height off the ground (see picture). Start to the right of a tree matched at the beginning of the sloper rail system

content.description: Matched start on block, move up on a left facing crimp, then hit the sloper at the lip. Move up then right for an exciting top out on slopers and edges (might help to scope the top out first - the tree branches to the left are good enough for 150 lbs, haven't tried anyone heavier yet....) Embrace the whale!
content.protection: 2-3 pads and maybe a spotter to boost your confidence on the top out
content.location: On the boulder to the left of Crucifriction. Starts matched on a crimp block
